channel.title: Having trouble putting server online
channel.description:
me and a friend are toying with noobscape v3, we have compiled the server and we have a dedicated server for it, its not going to be run locally.. but were having trouble setting up the port forwarding.. the firewall is turned off completely, and as far as this problem is concerned were both at a loss... would appreciate any help that can be given...
here are some errors im getting Terminating GameEngine java.io.FileNotFoundException: EasyRSC.cfg (Access is denied) java.io.FileNotFoundException: players\Cubistic.cfg (Access is denied) Address already in use: bind [Ljava.lang.StackTraceElement;@4526ba64
also i ran netstat through the cmd on my host side and this is what i got [IMG]http://i12.photobucket.com/albums/a209/darker6969/serverproblem.png[/img]

item.title: Having trouble putting server online
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote=“da real hype, post:2, topic:498955”]taskkill /F /IM java.exe

in ur run file will/should stop the bind issue[/quote]

this is what i was going to put

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble putting server online
item.dc:creator: @pecker70 pecker70
item.description:
@pecker70 wrote:

resolved, and for future issues with this issue. it was binded locally in the server.java file, i just had to set it to run on the universal ip 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble putting server online
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

taskkill /F /IM java.exe

in ur run file will/should stop the bind issue

Read full topic
